title.value: Эффективность применения заменителя молока сухого 'Тимавилк' в кормлении телят
Efficiency of application of milk dry substitute 'Timavilk' in calves feeding
Efficiency of application of milk dry substitute 'Timavilk' in calves feeding

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Kravtsevich, V.P., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the results of researches on an assessment of efficiency of application of milk dry substitute 'Timavilk' in feeding of calves are stated. It is established that the feeding of milk dry substitute 'Tivamilk' instead of dry whey as a part of concentrated mixes to calves didn't affect negatively safety of young growth. The calves receiving a diet with dry milk substitute, grew quicker of control on 20 g or 2,72%. Application of milk substitute in calves feeding more expediently, than dry whey owing to lower monetary costs. By results of zootechnical and economic researches it is offered to use a dry milk substitute 'Tivamilk' in calves feeding by inclusion in structure of mixed fodders or high-grade concentrated mixes.
